item.title: BART vs Grf showdown
item.description: Load packages # library(devtools) #devtools::install_github("vdorie/dbarts") library(dbarts) library(ggplot2) ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.4.4 library(tidyverse) ## Warning: package 'tidyverse' was built under R version 3.4.4 ## -- Attaching packages ---------------------------------- tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## v tibble 1.4.2 v purrr 0.2.4 ## v tidyr 0.8.1 v dplyr 0.7.5 ## v readr 1.1.1 v stringr 1.3.1 ## v tibble 1.4.2 v forcats 0.3.0 ## Warning: package 'tibble' was built under R version 3.

item.title: Interaction detection using Random Forest predictions
item.description: Comparing the predictions of a Random Forest model with the predictions of an Linear Regression model can inform us in what ways the OLS model can be improved. Here we explore the feasibility of this approach by modelling the classic Boston Housing dataset.
